# @sveltejs/vite-plugin-svelte

## 1.0.0-next.7

### Minor Changes

- [#32](https://github.com/sveltejs/vite-plugin-svelte/pull/32) [`113bb7d`](https://github.com/sveltejs/vite-plugin-svelte/commit/113bb7dc330a7517085d12d1d0758a376a12253f) Thanks [@dominikg](https://github.com/dominikg)! - Reduced cache usage, share css cache between SSR and client

## 1.0.0-next.6

### Minor Changes

- 1be46f1: improved css hmr
- a0f5a65: Allow other vite plugins to define preprocessors

### Patch Changes

- 8d9ef96: fix: do not preserve types unless useVitePreprocess option is true
- 6f4a253: disable svelte-hmr overlay by default
- 18647aa: improve virtual css module path (fixes #14)

## 1.0.0-next.5

### Patch Changes

- 61439ae: initial release
